name: windvane-pota
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Detailed artifact: windvane-pota, pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, pressure-forged metals, abstract sigils (not letters), gentle glow, hand or ruler for size, product render, skyward romantic realism, cloudstone and brass, wind-swept forms, airship motifs, palette: navy, gold, cloud-white, warm sun highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Runes should be abstract sigils, not letter-like gibberish. Avoid readable words on the item., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Artifact windvane-pota with materials, runes, and scale.
revised_prompt: Create an image in a heroic tabletop fantasy setting resembling the style of classical Dungeons and Dragons. The scene should contain medieval-fantasy elements including culturally coherent gear with no trace of modern technology. Ensure that the collection style is consistent and painterly. The centerpiece should be a detailed artifact - a windvane-pota abundantly decorated with pearls, corals, cloud-crystals and pressure-forged metals. The artifact should have abstract sigils glowing gently, instead of letters. To provide a frame of reference for its size, include a hand or a ruler in the scene. Present it as a product render. The overarching style should be skyward romantic realism, with emphasis on cloudstone and brass elements, and wind-swept forms characteristic of airship motifs. The color palette should primarily comprise navy, gold, cloud-white with warm sun highlights. Ensure the chosen aspect/resolution results in a clean render, with no artefacts. Ensure that any runes presented are abstract sigils rather than letter-like gibberish. There should be an absence of garbled or random strings of letters; if symbols are used, make them meaningful or numbered pins. Do not incorporate any sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style or bloom glare into the composition.
